app_name: Free Music - Unlimited offline Music download free
app_detail:
Free Music Discover section shows you the hottest buzzing new music and artists daily, before anyone else. Discover, stream, and organize breaking new music now. 

Free Music - Unlimited Music offline player KEY FEATURESï¼š
ğŸµFind new and trending new music first. Be the first of your friends to be up on whatâ€™s next.
ğŸµUnlimited streaming and music - play as much Hip-Hop, Electronic, Latin, Reggae, Pop, and Afropop as you want.
ğŸµ Listen to Free Online Music from YouTubeï¼ŒDiscover New & Trending music, automatically personalized according to your preference.
ğŸµCreate infinite playlists and organize your music
ğŸµEnjoy the gorgeous and modern design

UNLIMITED FREE MUSICï¼š
ğŸµEnjoy millions of free up-to-date songs form Youtube Music.
ğŸµMultitasking while listening to music using the Floating Player
ğŸµuse it with headphones and speakers!
ğŸµMusic is displayed and can be controlled on the screen. So you can enjoy music while using other apps.
ğŸµFull featured in app media player: repeat one/all, shuffle.

DISCLAIMER
Free Music Player is a legal and compliant 3rd-party API client that lets you play music & videos from YouTube & MP3s all within one app. (This is NOT an MP3 / video downloader app)
